thread.title: Two days in London Bank area
thread.title_full: Two days in London Bank area - Review of Premier Inn London Bank (Tower) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: MarkRosewell
title: Two days in London Bank area
text: This hotel was excellent in every way. The staff went to every effort to help including printing off boarding passes and storing luggage, especially Mattia. Our room was clean quiet and comfortable and within easy walking distance of Bank Station, London Bridge and the Tower of London. Would definitely recommend. Breakfast was the usual comprehensive Premier Inn fayre.
